name: Tower of Power (Rogue Pixel Games)
description:
Welcome to the TOWER OF POWER. 

The evil overlord DEMIAL has trapped you at the bottom of his Doomed Trispyre, and it is up to you to escape. You'll only have one chance at this before the unflinching red death consumes you.

TOWER OF POWER is a simple but fun and frantic vertical scroller. There are currently 3 levels in this version, and each level has a timer to so you can keep pushing yourself to beat your best time.

Left and Right Keys - Move

Up - Jump

Space - Restart Level

- - = { } = - -

Alpha version 0.2
